parameters.name: BizType
parameters.description:
The type of the application process. Default value: **java**. Valid values:

*   **java**: Java process.
*   **php**: PHP process.

parameters.name: Cmdline
parameters.description:
The startup parameter.

>  This parameter supports only prefix queries. Fuzzy match is not supported.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page. Default value: 10. If you leave this parameter empty, 10 entries are returned on each page.

>  We recommend that you do not leave this parameter empty.

parameters.name: Pid
parameters.description:
The process ID.

>  Only exact match is supported.

parameters.name: Remark
parameters.description: The information about the server that you want to query. The value can be the public IP address, private IP address, or name of the server. Fuzzy match is supported.

parameters.name: Uuid
parameters.description:
The UUID of the server.

> 

*   You can call the [DescribeCloudCenterInstances](~~DescribeCloudCenterInstances~~) operation to query the UUIDs of servers.

*   Only exact match is supported.
